name: colabdesign_ray_job_v2
metricsDescription:
*Stability Score:* larger value indicates higher confidence in the predicted local structure
*Affinity Score:* larger value indicates higher confidence in the predicted interface structure
*Note:* designs which lie within the green square are recommended for laboratory testing

pdb.description: PDB file with target protein to design against.

target_chain.description: Chain ID of the relevant target protein in the PDB file. Assuming A as target chain ID unless provided otherwise.

target_hotspots.description: List of target residues that should be in contact with the generated binder, e.g. A30, A33, A34.

binder_length.description: The length of the generated protein binder candidates.

target_start_residue.description: Use this setting to crop the target chain for faster binder generation. Integer index defining the first residue of a cropped section on the target chain.

target_end_residue.description: Use this setting to crop the target chain for faster binder generation. Integer index defining the last residue of a cropped section on the target chain.

expert_prompt_for_refined_binder_design.description: Use this setting for advanced prompts to crop and scaffold protein chains. For motif scaffolding, specify the chain ID of the motif followed by a range of residue indices. For free design, write x followed by the number of residues to generate. The prompt overrides all other GUI inputs.
